name: CrowdStrike LogScale
description: This plugin is used to deliver alerts, events, and webtx data. This plugin only supports sharing raw **JSON** data to CrowdStrike LogScale HTTP Event Collector.

configuration.label: CrowdStrike LogScale Host
configuration.description: URL of your CrowdStrike LogScale platform.

configuration.label: Ingest Token
configuration.description: Ingest token of your CrowdStrike LogScale platform. You can generate it from Settings>Ingest Tokens>Add Token.
